title: Outsider
description: What if the only way to be loyal is to betray?As an illegal citizen living Outside the Wall, Aleesha is used to surviving. Her cunning and willingness to trade sides where necessary has finally got her to a position of relative security. She has enough to eat, a bed to sleep in and her illegal status is still a secret. Or so she thinks. Aleesha thought she knew everyone on her gang's patch. But when a stranger accosts her on the street and tries to recruit her to work for his organisation, it's clear that he knows way too much about her past. Aleesha soon comes to realise that the fate of her gang, and herself, depends on the decision she's being forced to make. And she only has twenty-four hours to choose.Enter the world of The Wall Series: a disturbingly realistic vision of a future London. author: Alison Ingleby
